parameters.name: RotX
parameters.description: x coordinate for the rotation axis

parameters.name: RotY
parameters.description: y coordinate for the rotation axis

parameters.name: RotZ
parameters.description: z coordinate for the rotation axis

parameters.name: TanX
parameters.description: x coordinate for the tangent axis

parameters.name: TanY
parameters.description: y coordinate for the tangent axis

parameters.name: TanZ
parameters.description: z coordinate for the tangent axis

parameters.name: RadX
parameters.description: x coordinate for the radius axis

parameters.name: RadY
parameters.description: y coordinate for the radius axis

parameters.name: RadZ
parameters.description: z coordinate for the radius axis

parameters.name: Angle
parameters.description: Angle

parameters.name: PivotX
parameters.description: x coordinate for the pivot triad reference

parameters.name: PivotY
parameters.description: y coordinate for the pivot triad reference

parameters.name: PivotZ
parameters.description: z coordinate for the pivot triad reference

parameters.name: Type
parameters.description: -1 =None 0 = Bending 1 = Twisting 2 = Tapering 3 = Stretching 4 = Experimental

parameters.name: LeftTrim
parameters.description: Left trimming distance

parameters.name: RightTrim
parameters.description: Right trimming distance

parameters.name: HardEdges
parameters.description: True to embed edges where the trim planes intersect the body, false to create smoother continuous faces
